item.content:encoded: 35.50 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a king size double bed). This room is located upstairs and has a Moroccan living room, bathroom with bathtub in blue Zellij de Fes, mini bar, air conditioning, satellite TV, safe and telephone.

item.content:encoded: 23 square meters – 2 single beds (can be converted into a king size double bed). This room is located on a floor of the floor, has a bathroom with a blue zellige bathtub of Fez, mini bar, air conditioning, satellite TV, safe and telephone

item.title: La zouak√©e
item.dc:creator: ibayoussef
item.description: 39 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the first floor and has a beautiful view of the corridors of the riad. The bed is cedar, the living room is decorated in the traditional style of Fez.
item.content:encoded:
39 square meters – 1 king size bed. This suite is located on the first floor and has a beautiful view of the corridors of the riad.

The bed is cedar, the living room is decorated in the traditional style of Fez.

item.content:encoded: 31 m2, It is a Bedroom with carved cedar wood king size bed, Moroccan living room, a large bathroom with blue Fez Zellige bathtub, mini bar, air conditioning, satellite TV, safe and telephone.
